headline: NetCom Learning’s Post
post_text: GenAI apps have moved far past chatbots. Businesses are using them to automate workflows, power financial insights, and scale across multimodal experiences. And at the center of this shift? Amazon SageMaker. From unifying the entire ML lifecycle to integrating seamlessly with AWS services like Bedrock, SageMaker is fast emerging as the go-to platform for building and scaling GenAI apps. In this week’s edition of NetGen AI, Explained! we break down: → Why SageMaker is moving beyond ML pipelines into GenAI ecosystems → The toolkit powering everything from LLMs to diffusion models → Real-world use cases in finance, automation, and RAG-based search → Practical steps to start building your first GenAI app Plus: Curated courses and special offers to help you and your teams get hands-on with AWS GenAI. Read the full newsletter below. #GenAI #AmazonSageMaker #GenAITools #Newsletter #AWSTraining #NetComLearning
post_text_html:
GenAI apps have moved far past chatbots.

Businesses are using them to automate workflows, power financial insights, and scale across multimodal experiences.

And at the center of this shift? Amazon SageMaker.

From unifying the entire ML lifecycle to integrating seamlessly with AWS services like Bedrock, SageMaker is fast emerging as the go-to platform for building and scaling GenAI apps.

In this week’s edition of NetGen AI, Explained! we break down:
 → Why SageMaker is moving beyond ML pipelines into GenAI ecosystems
→ The toolkit powering everything from LLMs to diffusion models
→ Real-world use cases in finance, automation, and RAG-based search
→ Practical steps to start building your first GenAI app

Plus: Curated courses and special offers to help you and your teams get hands-on with AWS GenAI.

Read the full newsletter below.

#GenAI #AmazonSageMaker #GenAITools #Newsletter #AWSTraining #NetComLearning
title: How to Build GenAI Apps with Amazon SageMaker? | NetCom Learning

post_text: Hospitals of the future won’t just treat patients. They’ll predict, personalize, and prevent. And AI is already making that possible today. In Episode 4 of #AICERTsInAMinute , we explore 4 groundbreaking AI tools transforming healthcare. Tune in to see how AI is revolutionizing medical imaging, accelerating diagnosis, and enabling personalized treatment planning. But integrating these tools in your workflow requires a specific skillset, knowledge, and awareness. So, are you looking to AI-enable your healthcare operations? As an AI-Certs Authorized Partner, our AI+ Healthcare course equips your team with practical insights, live training, and hands-on labs to master these AI tools and more. Level up your healthcare teams today. Explore our AI+ Healthcare course: https://lnkd.in/gxfHk3QU #AIinHealthcare #AICerts #AIHealthcareTraining #NetComLearning

headline: NetCom Learning’s Post
post_text: Last week, we saw major shifts in the industry. From Microsoft looking to expand Copilot’s capabilities with new AI models, to OpenAI is pushing into large-scale infrastructure. But the biggest headline to note? The shifting workforce dynamics. AI-led layoffs across major tech firms point to a new reality: roles are evolving, and so must skills. We’ve pulled together the key highlights so you can see where the next big opportunities are opening up. Swipe through to catch up. Want deeper insights and training to turn these insights into business impact? Subscribe to our newsletter: https://shorturl.at/GIsEL Looking to keep your workforce ahead of the AI curve? Explore our AI training courses today: https://shorturl.at/VLxVE #WeeklyAIDigest #AIRoundUp #NetGenAIExplained #AITrends #NetComLearning

headline: NetCom Learning’s Post
post_text: We helped a federal law enforcement agency modernize its systems and strengthen data security with a custom training program. The agency relied on a legacy information system to process sensitive inmate records but faced recurring risks of unauthorized access and data misuse. With a migration to Active Directory on the horizon, they needed to quickly upskill over 300 employees to ensure a smooth and secure transition. That’s where NetCom Learning stepped in. This case details how we built our customized, hands-on training program on the Fundamentals of Active Directory, delivered by a Microsoft Certified Trainer helped the team execute a successful migration and build a future-ready IT infrastructure ready to meet modern security demands. Swipe through to see how we helped them achieve this transformation. Inspired? Let’s make your organization the next success story. Explore our MS Azure skilling programs today: https://lnkd.in/gzKNZ9sC #MicrosoftTraining #AzureSkills #SuccessStory #WorkforceUpskilling #NetComLearning
post_text_html:
We helped a federal law enforcement agency modernize its systems and strengthen data security with a custom training program.

The agency relied on a legacy information system to process sensitive inmate records but faced recurring risks of unauthorized access and data misuse. With a migration to Active Directory on the horizon, they needed to quickly upskill over 300 employees to ensure a smooth and secure transition.

That’s where NetCom Learning stepped in.

This case details how we built our customized, hands-on training program on the Fundamentals of Active Directory, delivered by a Microsoft Certified Trainer helped the team execute a successful migration and build a future-ready IT infrastructure ready to meet modern security demands.

Swipe through to see how we helped them achieve this transformation.

Inspired? Let’s make your organization the next success story.

Explore our MS Azure skilling programs today: https://lnkd.in/gzKNZ9sC

#MicrosoftTraining #AzureSkills #SuccessStory #WorkforceUpskilling #NetComLearning
title: Case Study: Custom Microsoft Training for a Law Agency | NetCom Learning

post_text: Building ML models can be quite complicated. But Google Cloud’s Vertex AI provides a unified ML platform that simplifies the entire workflow, from data prep to deployment. Join Dr. Imran Ahmad, PhD for an exclusive free masterclass, where he’ll walk you through how to harness Vertex AI for scalable, enterprise-ready ML solutions. In just 2 hours, you’ll learn: → How Vertex AI unifies the ML lifecycle → Simplified data preparation & management workflows → AutoML vs custom model training → Seamless deployment and monitoring at scale Master the tools that are shaping the next generation of ML innovation. Sep 24th | 12 PM EST | 2 Hours Seats are limited. Secure yours today. Register now: https://lnkd.in/gd6sfgsc #VertexAI #GoogleCloud #MachineLearning #AIEssentials #FreeWebinar #NetComLearning
